alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 3:30AM MST until November 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wintry mix of light freezing drizzle, light freezing rain, light snow, and freezing fog. * WHERE...Permian Basin and most of Lea County. * WHEN...Late tonight through noon Saturday. * IMPACTS...Light ice on exposed surfaces may impact travel in some areas, especially Saturday morning. Check on pipes, plants, and people. Wind chills of 15 to 20 degrees are expected Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
